content.detailedDescription: We were at the 7mile bridge just before the sun set in the florida keys. we saw a jet fly over and we took a photo. as the sun neared being set i noticed a blak grayish spehere hovering to the right of the 7 mile bridge. i pointed it out to my husband. we waited and watched for 15 min or so to see if it was a blimp or helicopter but it never moved! after the sun had set ad there was still some light in the sky we walked back to the car, my husband decided to run behind a tree to relieve himself. when he returned he said the object was  still in the sky. this was maybe 8 minutes or so after watching it for 15 minutes earlier. darkness fell as we began to drive and whe we looked for the object we could no longer see it. the bridge was full of people but no one seemed to notice. i stopped a jogger passig by and asked him what he thought it was...He shrugged his shoulders and said he didnt know either. well i did get a few seconds on video ad i will upload it along with the photo of the plane.
content.summary: Black gray like sphere

content.detailedDescription: We were at the 7mile bridge just before the sun set in the florida keys. we saw a jet fly over and we took a photo. as the sun neared being set i noticed a blak grayish spehere hovering to the right of the 7 mile bridge. i pointed it out to my husband. we waited and watched for 15 min or so to see if it was a blimp or helicopter but it never moved! after the sun had set ad there was still some light in the sky we walked back to the car, my husband decided to run behind a tree to relieve himself. when he returned he said the object was  still in the sky. this was maybe 8 minutes or so after watching it for 15 minutes earlier. darkness fell as we began to drive and whe we looked for the object we could no longer see it. the bridge was full of people but no one seemed to notice. i stopped a jogger passig by and asked him what he thought it was...He shrugged his shoulders and said he didnt know either. well i did get a few seconds on video ad i will upload it along with the photo of the plane.
content.summary: Black gray like sphere

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my porch looking up into the sky on february 24, 2012 at approximcately 7:35 pm and witnessed a ufo at a low altitude moving roughly from south to north across the sky.  i notice a very faint light coming my direction at a very rapid velocity.  the light was highlighted on the front of the craft in a thin line almost unvisible.  unless you weren'tlooking at it you would not notice it.  the shape looked like a triangle and got more prominent as it came closer to me.  it moved very fast,smooth and silent through the sky.  i saw it for maybe five seconds.  it was as wide as the block that i live on!  it was huge!!!!!!  omg!  i cant believe i just saw a ufo!
content.summary: Triangular shape ufo sighting please read the detailed description

content.detailedDescription: I was lying in bed and i had just shut my tv off. this was the first time in 20 years i had turned off my tv to go to bed because i'm severely afraid of the dark. i had not slept the night before and for some reason i felt comfortable enough to sleep with just the light of the night. i spent approximately 20 minutes performing my yoga breathing exercises. when i was done i opened my eyes and i was facing my open window. in clear view was a star, aspirin sized and completely stationary. to the slight right of this star was what i first thought to be an airplane due to its slow and steady speed and its straight trajectory. almost immediately after i noticed this object it accelerated to a speed i cant explain or understand. at the same time as its mind-numbing acceleration i heard a sound that i also struggle to explain. i have been witness to a shuttle launching and although this sound wasnt as loud, its the nearest comparison i can make with the exception of what i imagine a sonic boom to be. i was suprised that the windows didnt shake. i literally jumped out of my bed as it disappeared and made that sound, i ran to the farthest range of vision that my window accords. it was completely gone. i was and am very frightened although i never felt any realistic threat. i was so shaken up after this that i ran around my house hysterically and couldnt wake either of parents who are very light sleepers. i consider myself to be an open-minded person but also a healthy skeptic. this experience truly defies my understanding.
content.summary: I witnessed what i first believed to be an airplane due to its steady slow straight course. it immediately accelerated to a speed unknown to me in concordance with a boom. it was gone completely after that.

content.detailedDescription: no blinking. did not move ....Than left a high rate away from me. was between 5 and 7 miles away from me. unlike anything i have ever seen.
content.summary: Bright red dot in sky. .

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were traveling in our car after an evening out to dinner when we noticed unusual lights emitting from an aircraft.We were in close proximity to a rural airport, so air traffic is not unusual and at first glance we thought it was a helicopter because of the manner in which it was descending. this particular craft was descending vertically without horizontal movement. the ufo descended over a rural patch of homes and hovered approximately 50-100ft over them. after realizing the aircraft was not going near the airport only sitting stationary over people's homes, we decided to turn the car around. upon reaching the site the craft had been hovering we noticed it had ascended significantly to the point of appearing star-like. we drove around the site of homes to look for any sign of evidence or anything that could explain what could have been seen, but nothing was found. while my girlfriend watched the sky we continued to our home approximately 2 miles from the site. once home we got out of the car and observed the star-like craft that glowed much brighter than all other stars and was much larger. while watching the ufo began to glow and had an orange/yellow aura around it for about 30 seconds after which it disappeared. my girlfriend had the best look at this aircraft because she was the passenger. she explains it as disc-like, larger than a helicopter with a white light and red lights on the sides. the surface of the craft was dark and it was quite cloudy that night because of storms, thus making it impossible to get a good look. after the sighting we were scared and curious. neither of us had seen anything like what we saw that evening. we decided to report the event to see if anyone else had a similar experience.
content.summary: From car noticed ufo hovering near local airport. hovered over residential homes. aircraft never accelerated horizontally, only moved vertically. increased air traffic noted near craft.

content.detailedDescription:
2/23/12 aprox 8 pm, i went out side with my dog to the back yard. i often gaze up to the stars when i'm in my backyard and am pretty familiar with north star, dippers, when mars is visable.  i have lived in my home since 1993. 
while gazing up at the night sky a saw a very bright, almost gold and pulsating "star" in the sky.  i was facing west, south-west and it appeared in the distance,to my left, in far horizon above our local tall pine trees.
i thought it was a star first, then noticed the bright star i usually see high towards the south was there and this was to the left and about 45 degrees lower.  
as i watched the light, i noticed the light changed colors from the golden light to green then to bright white and sending rays of light directly below it and lighting up the clouds underneath it.  it seemed to grow closer then zig zag slightly, then steady and lights change again same patent as before.
i live on the edges of jblm and am used to all the different planes and jets and helicoptors.  this would stay stationary then move and then stop.
military planes were doing a completely unusaul flight paterns while this thing was lighting up the western sky.  lots of helicoptor activity around as well.
i watched this light move and stop and pulse and change colors and lighting the clouds around it, for 5-6 minutes.  i went back inside.
i kept telling myself it was just a star or something and my eyes were playing tricks on me.  but i knew it was something else, and went back outside 5 or more minutes later.
i looked again to the west and saw the light still there but now moving slightly north west, still a large glowing light.  then in literally seconds or less, it shot out, going higher than the star that  just previously above  was high above it.  then it was like a distant pin of light, then gone completely from the sky.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Yellow glowing light changing green and sending bright light that lit up the clouds below it

content.detailedDescription: Ive told my story before i had a face to face encoutner when i was i child and recenlty had flash back after hitting my head  i was told you could help me remember more with a regresive hypnosis treatment. i was to afraid at first and since lost the number i was supposed to contact. can u help me i feel i am ready to find out what else i cant remember if there is anything that i didnt already tell u
content.summary: I want to do the regresive hypnosis

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down my street and approaching my driveway, when i noticed a large "basketball" sized red glowing sphere, descending straight down in the sky northwest of my location.   it did not fall quickly but made a steady straight descent down.  it was not like an airplane or a helicopter.  i did not hear any sound at all and it appeared to be within a mile from my home.  it took only about 30 seconds, and by the time it would have been too low to notice i got out of my car in my driveway, expecting to hear an explosion, but there was no sound.  there was no flash to indicate a landing site.  i quickly shouted to my family in the house but by the time they responded there was nothing left to see.  one suggested was it maybe a flare someone shot up in the sky, that may have had a parachute.  i guess that is certainly possible but the red glowing sphere to me appeared 20 times the size you would expect a flare to be, and there was no tail.
unfortunately, there wasn't even time to grab my phone to video tape it as it was visible less than 30 seconds and my phone was zipped up in my purse.
it was a dark rainy night but the roads were rather busy and i am sure a lot more people noticed it than myself.
content.summary: Saw large ball of red flame descending steadily down, not quickly, just straight down from high in the sky, descending and appearing to "land".  did not see landing site.  observed while driving down my street into my drive in the northwestern sky.

content.detailedDescription:
9:50 pm just before newburgh beacon bridge heading east on i84 in ny.  i
saw a really bright light towards the south as i was approaching the
bridge.  it wasn���t moving.  at first i thought it was a really tall cell
tower or something like that, but as i got nearer the bridge i noticed it
was not on the side of the road, but over it.  it still wasn���t moving and
as i got closer i saw it had four horizontal bright white lights in a row,
like a light bar you���d see in a bathroom, but the two lights on the edges
were much brighter and flashing brighter and dimmer.  it was about the size
of a jumbo jet���s wing span but the lights were much too big for it to have
been a plane.  i���m not a great judge of distance especially at night and
when i cannot judge the entire size of something, but i���d say it was less
than 1000 feet above the ground���.And then i drove right underneath it.  it
didn���t move.  i felt like this was not normal.  if a plane it would have to
move, and it wasn���t shaped like a helicopter.   it was a straight bar with
four distinct lights in a row.
content.summary: Observed stationary lights hovering over roadway

content.detailedDescription: First off this is the third time i witnessed this star like object in the night sky, so im finally reporting it. last friday around 7:00pm i took my dog out for a walk. the sky was real clear with little clouds while walking east down the street i just glance up in the sky and to west of me there is this really bright white light. the light was definetly brighter than the stars that where out so i knew it wasnt that or a planet. so while walking the dog im watching this object in the sky and it looks motionless but the light would get dim then go bright. like it was moving up and down. the object was sitting the western horizon and the stars where stright above me so i know im not seening things. i run home to grab my camera and get in my car to follow this bright light. i drove out of the city to tape this thing. all the camera got was a bright light so so shap can be identified but as got to orefield the light was getting dim again like it was moving west. so i drove 2 more miles to a church parking lot and filmed what i could. i parked in a church parking lot to film this bright light and when i parked there the light now looked like a yellowish-white color, but looked like it moved slowly futher away. so after minutes of taping my battery died and i left i drove towards home and tried to spot the brigh whitelight but it was gone. by this time its around 8:15 on a friday night so i know a planet would not last for a hour in the sky. now this is the 3rd time i witnessed this and it has to be something.I told my friends and dad and they think i was nuts until i showed the video.
content.summary: Bright star- like object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I came outside to walk my dog and happened to look up and saw what at first appeared to be a flock of geese flying in formation. i looked a little closer and thought it was odd that i was not hearing anything at all. i watched the object move almost as if it were on a current of air in a northeasterly direction. one of the characteristics that seemed to set it apart from a flock of geese was that there were lights which made the outline visible. there was almost no moonlight and it was partly cloudy as well.
content.summary: V- shaped object flew in a northeasterly direction overhead

content.detailedDescription: In back garden having cigarette. dark with light wispy cloud with stars visible. watching plane on usual west to east flight path beginning it's descent into birmingham airport(bhx). object flew into view an inch above plane (from my perspective) from east to west at seemingly twice the speed of the plane. intrigued by the speed and the continuous glow which was yellowy gold. initial thought was a meteor/comet but quickly realised no tail and object wasn't descending, it was moving accross the sky. object made a series of abrupt directional changes (i saw 4) of about 20 degrees horizontally which confirmed to me this was not a plane or meteor and prompted me to write this report. the object travelled from directly above me, looking up at approx 60 to the north, to the western horizon in no more than 20 seconds. frustratingly, even with 3 planes at various points & heights in view, i cannot estimate the height of the object or therefore the speed or size. i can only express the speed of the object relative to the plane flying in the opposite direction from my perspective appeared to be twice that of the plane. i could not tell truly whether the object was above or below the plane but i felt that it was higher. i would be surprised if no one on any of the three planes saw it and if it did not appear on bhx radar, i would want to know what is wrong with their equipment. my partner also witnessed this object. i would just also like to add that we are 15miles from bhx so are more than familiar with planes of all shapes & sizes, we have lived here for 12 years and have only once previously seen something that we could not instantly dismiss as a plane (didn't report that). this was definitely not a plane and it was definitely intelligently controlled.
content.summary: Zig zag flight path e to w, 3 planes also visible at same time. speed twice plane speed.

content.detailedDescription: Walking along road i walked every night home from girlfriends house while crossing wooden bridge i heard a low whoring sound, as i looked up i saw a very large object hovering about 50 feet above me and about 30 feet in front of me, the object had a square body more than 3/4 of its entire length then what i assumed was the front made up the rest,it was shaped like an arrow head the body was illuminated in white lights @ every 10 feet outlining its shape, in the back of the object there were three large red lights pulsating in unison with the whirring sound, i looked at the object in awe, it then slowly moved off to the west and was gone  i arrived back at my sisters house where my good friend was waiting for me to return and he had asked where have i been, i was apparently looking at this thing for a good 3 hours  but to me it was only 15 minutes, i looked every night for this thing and never saw again this happened in caspian michigan
content.summary: Walking home from girlfriends house

content.detailedDescription:
i lived in la 92-96. i was married at the time and travelling with my wife from la west hollywood up the freeway to ventura county. it was between april 93-august 93, or april 93-august 94.

clear day. i was passenger, my wife was driving. while heading towards ventura county i spot a "cloud" forming about 5,000 feet away, at an elevation of about 500-800 feet. it is forming from a small circle and is expanding into a rectangular cloud, which i estimate from inception to completion was about 30 seconds. i ask willow my wife, to look at it and demand she pull over. she does so. we both get out of the car and look up. it is about 800 feet away, at an elevation of about 500 feet. the cloud is not moving. it simply looks like a rectangular cloud i estimate between 50-80 feet long, by 20-30 feet.

as we are staring at it, i did notice other drivers pull up and stop, too.

after about 10 seconds, a ball appears from the cloud. it is a perfect ball. it looks sort of copper/brown in color. no lights. no sounds. it moved up about 50 feet and then darts west of my view about 600 feet within less than 1 second in a curve s now it is about 800 feet in the air. it stops and remains stationary for about 3 seconds then drops down 400-500 feet (so it is momentarily about 300 feet from the ground and loops back up and heads into the cloud. this manouver was faster than the first and took less than a second, too. 

the ball was about 30 feet i guess in diameter - though oddly, i seem to recall it slightly of a larger diameter than the cloud.

it "hit" the cloud while accelerating - but nothing came out to other side. no sonic crack - nothing.

over the next 30 seconds the cloud "vaporizes" and simply evaoprates. there is nothing there.

my wife and i (divorced now) were religious as we did not want to discuss it after we saw it. i know others saw it, too - as they were parked watching, but we did not speak to them, we drive off.

i thought i would finally report it as to this day - depsite me being very anti-religious and very oriented in the sciences, the fact remains it was real and happened in broad daylight. there must be others who have since reported this incident.

this is the first and only ufo i have ever seen.

thank you for your time.
content.summary: Cloud emits orb. flys. returns to cloud. vanishes.

content.detailedDescription: I like came home from riding the elephants and i was peacfully eacting a mushroom sandwich when i turned and saw a huge reptilic creature wearing my bubooshka's clothing. he had on big framed pedophile glasses and my bubooshka's double d bra..Also he wore my five inch high heals...With a flower pot on his head. then it flew towards at me ripping somthing...My clothes and skin most likely and he opened his  mmouth spit and thats all i remember...........................................................................................................................................Now...Im pregnent..And i'm a virgin to my knowledge. i walked around the house and found my dog on top of my lifeless grandmother...Akward! then i smelt the worst smell of my life...Worse than the dead animals on the prarie. it was like a mix of every bad smelling thing you can imagine. it was coming fropm my cellar..At first i thought it was the dead rats down there...But no...I saw a blob of discussting purple yellow splotched goo. nasty! so i picked it up to throw it away but it burnt me..Next thing i remember is waking up in my basement and it was gone.......................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................Im so sorry..I lost a bet and i have to send this or eat aa dead mouse you can dismiss this if you don't want a laugh.
content.summary: Ohmegod. it raped m e

content.detailedDescription:
While driving to work yesterday (2-23-12) morning i spotted two dark colored objects hovering in the sky.  it was about 8am.

i was driving eastward along the bayfront connector (the part right down by the bay, sloppy duck, marina, etc.), and as i took a glance up at the houses that sit up on top of the bank that was just cleared i noticed these two things hovering above the houses.

the houses are probably a good 300 feet up the embankment and to the right of the road i was travelling on. the objects appeared to be at least another 300 feet above the houses.

the objects were shaped like three-finned boat propellers sitting parallel to the ground.

it took me about 3 minutes to drive past the objects where they weren't visible anymore due to me being out of range, but they stayed put for at least 3 minutes.

at first i thought they were balloons that car dealerships sometimes tie down with long tethers to advertise sales but no tether was visible.  they looked to be flying at the same height that you would see one of those advertisement balloons flying.

i couldn't believe that no one pulled over to watch these things, but then again neither did i.  almost afraid of the stigma, you know?
content.summary: Two odd-shaped, dark objects hovering in the sky during morning commute. erie, pa

content.detailedDescription: It was a summer evening. i was standing alone by the backdoor of our home. i did not see or hear anything but suddenly to my right side field of vision was a large silver football shaped craft. it appeared to be revolving/spinning but it remained stationary. the surface was sparkling. there was a green light under the craft at the front. the other end had a red light. there was a rectangular window where i saw 3 bright blue entities from the waist up. they had the features of a "grey". we observed each other in silence for about 3 minutes. no one moved. i was afraid to move. the craft then silently rose vertically, then horizontally toward the blue mountains and disappeared in a matter of seconds. i ran inside to tell my mother. she said i "was as white as a sheet".
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Silver football shaped craft with a rectangular window revealing 3 blue entities

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving on the freeway southbound on the 101 heading towards hollywood.  there was a lot of traffic on the road and in the sky it looked like an airplane was on fire.  there was a red blinking light with a flame coming out of the back that resembled a shooting star, except it lingered for at least a minute or so.
then i noticed that the flaming part separated from the red blinking part and "fell" down and just seemingly disappeared.  the red light started moving towards the right and then seeming disappeared.
on the right, i noticed 2 bright white lights diagonal from each other. 
the one on the top right remained stationary while the one on the bottom left was moving back and forth (diagonally from top left to bottom right) really fast.  
the feelings i had as i was watching this were "what the heck is going on?" and i was wondering if anyone else in the other cars was seeing what i was seeing.  i lost sight of the objects as i exited off the freeway.
content.summary: First looked like airplane on fire.  then saw 2 lights together.  one light moving fast back and forth diagonally.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in  the side yard going to put the flowers in the garage then i see a orange circle like shape. i went to tell my mom , then when we came out there was a total of three ufos. what made me notice the object was well, i just looked into the sky then i see the ufos.


what i  thought it was well, ufos.    the actions that the ufos were doing well 2 ufos were flying in a triangular shape. then a third one came from no where then they were in a triangle shape. i went to go tell my grandma then i think two dissapeared.
  then 1 was still there blinking  one light witch it only had,no extras.  it was blinking on and of continuously .I think that i saw the object without the light. the 3 witnesses were me, my mom and my grandma. then all the activity stopped. my mom and i left to go get ice, and we smelt smoke kind of where the object were probably. when we got back alot of helicopters were flying. the reactions of every one was shock . my mom thought it was cool i was scared and i don't know my grandma's reaction. i lost sight of the object  it was blinking then just stopped and that's when i lost sight.

if i did see the object it looked cigar shaped.
content.summary: Ovlal shaped or circle , orangeish formed a triagle, bcame a different time period about a minute.

content.detailedDescription: I went to smoke a cigarette on my lunch break at work in my car in the parking lot because it was very windy (gusts hit 40 mph according to local npr station). i turned on the radio to listen to npr while i smoked and leaned over to roll down the passenger side window (which was not in the direction of the wind). when i rolled it down i noticed a bright star like object that appeared.  it materialized out of thin air.  it became brighter until it reached its full luminosity. it hovered for about a couple of seconds then began to move. the object was in the direction of the south-west and then moved towards the east or south. it looked far away, and i could not tell if it was moving south or east from that distance. it moved very slowly, like watching a high altitude jumbo jet flying far, far off int he distance. there were no contrails, however. it's speed and velocity could not be verified by me. after traveling in a straight line for about 10 to 15 seconds, it stopped, and then became much brighter, and simply disappeared. i looked in that same direction for a minute or two to see if it would reappear but it did not. the location i witnessed it at is near the sacramento international airport where one can see several or more southwest airlines boeing 737-300s taking off and landing. they fly much closer to the ground than this object seem to be, and high altitude jumbo jets that fly over sacramento i have noticed take the same flight paths, which was not were this object was. unfortunately, i have no photos or videos.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright light appears, hovers, moves, then brightens and disapears

content.detailedDescription:
Flashing statanary light. red then blue almost looked like a square and the two white flashes round. just to the left of orions belt newmarket nh 2/23/12 815 pm to 9 15 pm, hazy sky. 
tought the blue was the sun reflection off a satalite. 
i would guess its a balloon. right? never seen any thing quite like it. we sit in the hot tub often and just look up. 
after about a hour i would say it was slowley moving left to right..
girl friend saw it too.

thanks brian
content.summary: Left of orions belt flashing still light, two wittneses, red blue white flash every 10 min or so, hazy sky

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving down 355 last
night in gaithersburgand i noted a very bright object in the sky, and since it was not moving too fast decided it had to be a helicopter,  it looked like a three pointed star.  surely that was because of the atmosphere, i thought.  then we made a left turn and i saw two more up in the sky, again very bright and seemed to consist of three pointy arms.  the really odd thig is that they seemed to be so close together- flying in formation.
content.summary: We were driving down 355 lastt night and i noted a very bright object in the sky, and since it was not moving too fast decided it had to be a helicopter,  it looked like a three pointed star.  surely that was because of the atmosphere, i thought.  then we

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i love to hike and look up at the sky.Almost every night for the pass three years when i am going to bed i will look out our back door and just enjoy the stars.I had read on the internet where mercury or mars was suppose to be getting to cross paths with venus.The night was clear and the stars where out and almost as soon as i started looking up i noticed right away in the western sky one white star like luminous object that seemed to be venting or sparking from the bottom(almost like a tail).And to the right of that was a red orb that looked like a red core with a pulsating ring around it(about a mile away).I did not see a metal craft.I do live by the airport and i know it was not a plane.I know it was not a start because after 30 minutes they would have moved in the sky but these stood still.I went to wake my wife up and they where gone.The feeling i got was not one of dread but hay we are just watching you all and relax.
content.summary: Two very bright lights in the sky .One was white a shined like a star but appeared to have a tail.The other red glowing orb with a pulse of red around it.

content.detailedDescription:
Have been seeing for a week now. same location. lights appear in the distance, getting larger and hover over treetops.
witnessed from outside on a deck at residence.
thought it was a star, but moved quietly forward and then back.
disk like with smaller lights.
the most recent sighting, there were 2 objects.
stood and watched, but unable to identify.
content.summary: Bright lights appear and hover. forward and back movement

content.detailedDescription: I looked up saw this and took the picture.
content.summary: Light reflective , shiny

content.detailedDescription:
Date : 1st february 2012 evening environ 20:30
location :
 from my car on motorway a6 luxembourg country ,
 driving from west to east at average speed 110 km/hour about 1 kilometer before "croix de gasperich" (motorway crossing),
 and about 1 kilometer south of luxembourg city.

weather :
 frozen (environ -5���c)
 dark blue crystal clear sky

ufo : 
  sharp (no rounded border of any kind) equilateral triangle, no tail,
  deep black color (clear shape, very visible due to backgrounded dark blue sky )
  3 average sized white lights (would say 1/20th of triangle width) , 1 per triangle corner but not at the corner end.
  1 average sized red light at the center (quite same size as the 3 white lights)
  i would say 2 (or more?) small sized (can't determine the size) blinking white light near the center
  triangle side length is at least 100 meters. 
  ufo flight very low altitude (environ 150 meters above ground)
  flying straight from south to north going right above luxembourg city (illegal way path for conventional airplane ) 
  the object was almost right above me. (object sight started at environ 45��� angle from horizon front of me)
  the closest airport  (luxembourg airport) low altitude airway is oriented south-west to north-east.
  the ufo speed was quite slow (environ 1 triangle side length every 2 seconds :  environ 50m/s )
  i didn't notice any particular sound (no noticable sound from inner car on motorway)
  notice it presence due to its low altitude, south north direction to city (illegal), and shape
  loosing it sighting due to motor way bring me to the south (then lost sighting)

collateral :
 i often use this motorway at about same time  (every working day evening)
 i often see planes  (a320 alike) the evening ,due the airport just few kilometers away.
content.summary: Black sharp triangle with 3 bright white light at corner and 1 red lights at center

content.detailedDescription: Nice clear sky, witnessed similar events at least 4x in last 3 months will describe .  i do not believe them to be sattelites or space station.  watch the skies from elma,wa to aberdeen,wa. someone with a camera may have reported. i wish there was a way to find out what they may be without calling a non-emergency police number. is /are there radar monitors in this area?   i am ex military ,and am familar with aircraft of many types. these were neither military nor commercial nor rescue/police helicopters. we have them.     ufo tourists ?  waiting/pre-event....Observing areas of pacific ring of fire in anticipation of predicted march earthquake of 2012???
content.summary: Actually observed what i believe to be two objects .. 1 in a ssw of my location ..This one i observed activity  on three occassions other was s.E. apx.4 miles

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home around 9 pm central time and i saw a rapidly moving figure in the sky that had blinking lights. it made my phone unable to call or recieve anything and my radio became very staticy. the object disappeared. i assume it teleported or something.
content.summary: Saw a rapid moving thing low in the sky with blinking lights. my phone stopped working and my radio got staticy.
